meanings.definition: The quality of being willing to take risks or try new things.
meanings.sent1: Her venturousness in trying new foods led her to discover her love for sushi.
meanings.sent2: His venturousness in exploring new hiking trails always kept him excited for the next adventure.
meanings.sent3: The venturousness of the squirrel trying to steal nuts from the bird feeder was both daring and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The venturousness of the young entrepreneur to start her own business was like a flame that couldn't be extinguished.
meanings.sent5: The venturousness of the astronaut stepping onto the alien planet made history in the making.

meanings.definition: A willingness to engage in daring or risky activities.
meanings.sent1: The group's venturousness in skydiving together created a strong bond among them.
meanings.sent2: His venturousness in bungee jumping showed his fearless spirit to conquer fears.
meanings.sent3: The venturousness of the cat trying to catch the laser pointer dot was both daring and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her venturousness in pursuing extreme sports was like a wild ride with no end in sight.
meanings.sent5: The venturousness of the explorer diving into the deep sea made the unknown depths seem less intimidating.
